User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (X11; U; Linux i686; fr; rv:1.9.2.14) Gecko/20110221 Ubuntu/10.10 (maverick) Firefox/3.6.14
Build Identifier: 

For the Join Mozilla program (and maybe at other occasions), a couple of limitations have been found to the Blue State Digital system.

This bug is a meta-bug to point limitation and discuss solutions to address them.

Reproducible: Always
